channel.title: Help with client please
channel.description:
Your server is now online. Connection from cpc1-croy1-0-0-cust158.croy.cable.virginmedia.com:58576 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (cpc1-croy1-0-0-cust158.croy.cable.virgi nmedia.com) Connection from cpc1-croy1-0-0-cust158.croy.cable.virginmedia.com:58577 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (cpc1-croy1-0-0-cust158.croy.cable.virgi nmedia.com) Connection from cpc1-croy1-0-0-cust158.croy.cable.virginmedia.com:58578 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (cpc1-croy1-0-0-cust158.croy.cable.virgi nmedia.com)
this is what i get when i run my source then try and login in with my client
any ideas?
thanks luke

item.title: Help with client please
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

You can’t log in to your server using your server ip.

YOU have to use your ipvn adress.

192.168.1.###

Read full topic

item.title: Help with client please
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=440043.msg3233631#msg3233631 date=1276297382]

Server is on 43595;
But the error you posted.
You’re connecting with the ports: 58576, 58577, 58578

Thats not the problem. He is connecting on port 43594. Those ports are for connections.
[/quote]

Did I say they were client ports?
No, please re-read. connecting with the ports:[/quote]
java.net.ServerSocket(43594, 1, null); Is not the same as java.net.Socket, allow me to repeat, that is not the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with client please
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Server is on 43595;
But the error you posted.
You’re connecting with the ports: 58576, 58577, 58578[/quote]

Thats not the problem. He is connecting on port 43594. Those ports are for the newly accepted connection

Read full topic
